article.Heading: Union Budget 2016-17: Govt to levy 1-4% infra cess on cars, SUVs; Maruti slips 5%
article.Summary: Shares of Maruti Suzuki slipped 5 percent intraday Monday on announcement by Finance Minister, Arun Jaitley to levy 1-4 percent infrastructure cess on cars, SUVs and higher engine capacity vehicles.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Maruti Suzuki slipped 5 percent intraday Monday on announcement by Finance Minister, Arun Jaitley to levy 1-4 percent infrastructure cess on cars, SUVs and higher engine capacity vehicles.

At 13:18 hrs Maruti Suzuki India was quoting at Rs 3,316.95, down Rs 92.10, or 2.70 percent. It has touched a 52-week low of Rs 3,246.55.
